description: Event is dispatched when user/service asks for new runnable jobs on a resultset
title: Notification of triggering runnable jobs on a resultset

___requested_jobs.description: The buildernames and TaskLabels that should be added to a push
___requested_jobs.title: Requested Jobs

___requester.description: The requester of the action (usually an email)
___requester.title: Requester

___resultset_id.description: Project unique identifier for a resultset
___resultset_id.title: Resultset ID

___project.description: Identifier for treeherder project, like `try` or `mozilla-central`.
___project.title: Project Name

___decision_task_id.description: The Gecko Decision Task's Task ID for this resultset
___decision_task_id.title: decision_task_id
